alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 2:11PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...The Yukon River At Stevens Village. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying areas near Stevens Village is expected. Flooding as well as large blocks of ice being pushed onshore is possible. When an ice jam forms downstream, water will rise very rapidly, and water will remain high until the ice jam releases. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 201 PM AKDT, The River Watch Team reports a forty mile long run of bank-to-bank ice and high water approaching Stevens Village. There is strong in-place ice downriver at the start of the canyon, and it is likely an ice jam will form near this location. - It is expected that the surge of ice and high water will arrive at Stevens Village Monday evening, and flooding is likely Monday night and Tuesday morning. - http://weather.gov/aprfc - If you live near or along the Yukon River river at Stevens Village, stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
